text:
Hello I hope you are well!

Can anybody help me?

I would like to track to see if the person who clicked the link in the email registered on the landing page that was linked.

In case I send a link through the HubSpot platform, which is directed to a HubSpot page, I want to know if he has registered on that page.

Is there any HubSpot api able to give me this information?

thanks!  :slightly_smiling_face:
I can't find any one information about this.

Hi there! I've a few questions about `workflows`
1- For example, If you want to use `format data` in the workflow, using `change data format` in the field `created_date`and then send it to a google sheet, does it only send rows with non empty `created_date` field?
2 - Using the API i just have 150 calls per 10 sec, so, when I used the workflow, just add 150 rows, but i need like 600, how can i do to get everything? (in this field i think there is a lot of answers, but i can't get any :c )

thanks!!!
Does the landing page have a HubSpot form on it? If so, you can go to the Form and then under the Submissions tab see who submitted the form and on what page.
Hey <@U02NJACH5QS> thank you for the response. This makes sense
just wondering if anyone has experienced what i shared earlier? Or what might be the issue here?
